definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: The paper explores the problems occurring in the existing translation works.
sentences.chinese: 该论文将习用语翻译中出现的问题归纳为三类。

sentences.english: But in Yunnan province, many plants (including D. delavayi) are habitually used as Rhizoma Drynariae.
sentences.chinese: 而在云南省则习用多种植物。

sentences.english: The soil criteria of P supplying ability worked out here were much lower than that commonly used for farmland.
sentences.chinese: 本文拟订的供磷能力分等标准比农田习用的要低得多。

sentences.english: This kind of fruit tastes very good.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店有很多种学习用品。

sentences.english: He sells school things every day .
This is the accustomed terms of payment in all-embracing business.
sentences.chinese: 这是国际商业中习用的付款方式。

sentences.english: This is the normis terms of payment in internis online coair conditioningh business.
sentences.chinese: 这是国际贸易中习用的付款步骤。

sentences.english: The site also allows students to buy and sell old textbooks and other school supplies.
sentences.chinese: 学生们也可以在这个网站上买卖旧书或者学习用品。

sentences.english: Idioms are very close with culture, which can be testified by its origins.
sentences.chinese: 从它的来源来看，习用语与文化有着紧密的联系。

sentences.english: There are many stationary for the students in Si Chuan. How many? Let's count. One.
sentences.chinese: 把讲台布置成为四川灾区学生捐学习用品的场景。

sentences.english: You will have some school supply words today in the lesson.
sentences.chinese: 今天的课程中，你们会遇到一些关于学习用品的单词。

sentences.english: Twenty-three per cent of Tokyo schoolchildren will rely on government aid for things such as school supplies this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年，东京23%的小学生要依靠政府资助学习用品。

sentences.english: Objective To research the antibacterial activity of varieties of Flos Lonicerae produced in Sichuan.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨川产习用金银花的抑菌作用。

sentences.english: The next day, Hagrid takes Harry to London to shop for school supplies.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，海格带着哈利去伦敦购买学习用品。

sentences.english: I want some school things for my son.
sentences.chinese: 我要为我儿子买一些学习用品。

sentences.english: English is a language abounding with idiomatic expressions.
sentences.chinese: 英语是一种习用语极其丰富的语言。

definition: medicine made from a single herb/drug made from a single substance
well established/accepted as a result of long usage
to follow old patterns/to imitate existing models/to continue along the same lines
to copy (a text) from person to person/(of a text) to be transmitted by copying
to create/to inaugurate/to contrive/to build (a mechanism)
to consider erroneously/incorrectly attributed to sb
lit. view a text and interpret (idiom); to interpret word by word without understanding the meaning/a far-fetched interpretation
